price: Ukuri nyako ni uguturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe, ku bw’ibyo ntukabe mu bashidikanya.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
